title: Smoky Nacho Fries

author.name: Julie Hasson
author.note: Vegan chef and cookbook author based in Portland, OR

description: Enjoy these smoky nacho fries as a delicious appetizer or side dish. Crispy oven-baked potato wedges seasoned with nutritional yeast, cumin, onion, garlic, and smoked paprika are a perfect snack for any occasion.

instructions: For the Easy Oven-Baked Fries, preheat oven to 450 degrees.
Line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper and coat with cooking spray.
Rinse potato wedges in cold water and drain.
Dry on a clean towel to remove all moisture.
In a large bowl, toss potatoes with oil and sprinkle with salt.
Before baking, toss with nutritional yeast, cumin, onion, garlic, paprika, and salt.
Spread in a single layer on baking sheets.
Bake until crisp and golden brown, approximately 35 to 40 minutes, turning halfway through.
